description: Experienced in designing and developing secure, scalable, and production-grade web applications that combine strong backend logic with seamless frontend experiences.
Proficient in React, Next.js, Node.js, NestJS, Django REST Framework, and FastAPI â€” capable of building performant REST and serverless APIs, as well as dynamic, responsive UIs.
Specialized in implementing robust JWT-based authentication systems, role-based access control (RBAC), and AI-driven features powered by Gemini, OpenAI, and custom ML logic.
Hands-on with TypeScript, containerization using Docker, database design (PostgreSQL, MongoDB), and automated testing pipelines using Jest and Supertest.
Deployed and managed applications on AWS (EC2, Amplify, RDS, Lambda) and Vercel using GitHub Actions CI/CD, ensuring reliability, test automation, and continuous delivery.
Well-versed in agile workflows with tools like JIRA and GitHub Projects, applying Scrum-based sprint planning and task management for efficient project execution.
Maintains high code quality through unit testing, debugging, and API documentation with Swagger and Postman for smooth developer collaboration.
Quick learner who rapidly adapts to new frameworks, workflows, and emerging technologies in the web ecosystem.
